subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ryan Garko hit a three-run homer in the first inning and Casey Blake had a solo homer in the fifth last night to lift visiting Cleveland to a 5-3 victory and a three-game sweep of the Tigers.
snippet: Ryan Garko hit a three-run homer in the first inning and Casey Blake had a solo homer in the fifth last night to lift visiting Cleveland to a 5-3 victory and a three-game sweep of the Tigers.
